title: David Clough Endowed Professorship in Chemical and Biological Engineering Fund
description: To provide support for a Professorship in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering in the College of Engineering and Applied Science at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: This effort honors Professor Dave Clough, a CU chemical engineering alumnus and 40-year faculty member whose classes routinely rank as student favorites. As faculty athletics representative for the CU Boulder campus, Clough has advocated for student-athletes throughout his career. A stalwart supporter for the chemical and biological engineering department and College of Engineering & Applied Science, Clough plans to retire after the spring 2017 semester.
